thread.section_title: DogVacay Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of DogVacay | dogvacay.com | 2 of 137
thread.title: Raymond Seda

author: Raymond Seda
title: Raymond Seda
text:
My dog Astro was boarded at a pet "hotel" for 8 days a year ago and I got him back so traumatized by the experience that he wasn't himself for a good week.
The personalization and heightened individual care offered by the folks in DogVacay aren't here for the paycheck. They are dog-lovers and it shows. My pups had a wonderful uneventful stay on this "test" stay and now we can finally have peace of mind that we can go on extended vacation trips again and know that our kids will be well taken care of.
